Name ( Josh Braegger )

1. Convert the following 32bit floating point numbers to decimal
Show each of the 7 intermediate steps as described in the tutorial

C51DD400 ( -2525.25 )

	1100 0101 0001 1101 1101 0100 0000 0000
	1 10001010 00111011101010000000000
	     138  - 127 = 11
	          100111011101.01
	                  -2525.25
	

C49A4400 ( -1234.125 )

	1100 0100 1001 1010 0100 0100 0000 0000
	1 10001001 00110100100010000000000
	     137 - 127 = 10
	     10011010010.001
	         -1234.125
	     

477ACE40 ( 64206.25 )

	0100 0111 0111 1010 1100 1110 0100 0000
	0 10001110 11110101100111001000000
	     142 - 127 = 15
	     1111101011001110.01
	       64206.25
	          

 

2. Convert the following decimal numbers to 32 bit floating point
Show each of the 7 intermediate steps

-2560.5 ( C5200800 )

	101000000000.1
	1.010000000001
	  11 + 127 = 138
	             10001010
	110001010010000000001
	1100 0101 0010 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000
	 C    5     2    0   0     8    0    0
	 C5200800
	

5432.125 ( C6FFFE20 )

   1010100111000.001
   1.010100111000001
      12 + 127 = 139
                 10001011
   0 10001011 010100111000001
   0100 0101 1010 1001 1100 0001 0000 0000
     4    5    A    9    C    1   0     0 
     45A9C100

-32767.0625 ( C6FFFE20 )
   111111111111111.0001
   1.111111111111110001
			14 + 127 = 141
                       10001101
   1 10001101 111111111111110001
   1100 0110 1111 1111 1111 1110 0010 0000
     C   6    F    F    F     E   2    0
     C6FFFE20


40960.75

 1010000000000000.11
 1.01000000000000011
       15 + 127 = 142
           10001110
 0 10001110 01000000000000011
 0100 0111 0010 0000 0000 0000 1100 0000
   4   7     2    0   0    0    C    0
   472000C0
